entry.title: iiDk-the-actual/iis.Stupid.Menu
entry.summary:
A mod menu for Gorilla Tag with over 800+ mods

ii's Stupid Menu is a feature-packed mod menu for Gorilla Tag, built by me, iiDk. Whether you're looking to experiment, explore, or just mess around, this menu has you covered. Designed to be as useful as possible, it includes a variety of features and options that let you customize your modding experience to your heartâ€™s content.

Why settle for boring when you can have stupidly good?

ğŸ’¡ Why Open-Source?

Great question. The modding community used to be about sharing, learning, and improving together. But nowadays, everythingâ€™s locked behind paywalls and obfuscation. Thatâ€™s not how it should be.

By making ii's Stupid Menu open-source, I'm giving everyone the opportunity to:
âœ… Learn how mod menus work
âœ… Experiment with new ideas
âœ… Contribute to the Gorilla Tag modding scene
âœ… Keep modding free and accessible

Let's bring back the collaborative spirit of modding. No paywalls. No secrets. Just good code and great mods.

ğŸ“œ Can I Use This Code?

Yes! But thereâ€™s a catchâ€”you gotta play fair. GPL-3.0 License rules apply, which means:

  • If you use my code, your project must also be open-source.
  • Give credit where it's due.
  • No shady stuff.

Need help or want to collaborate? Hit me up on my Linktree or join the Discord server.
